languages.text: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.
languages.original_text: Когда на псайкера или его союзников действуют эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}, они получают +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} за каждый такой эффект.

traits.locale_text: The Psyker's allies and the Psyker themselves under the effects of the psychic powers gain +5 Toughness for each of such effects.
When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of the psychic powers, they gain +5 Toughness for each of such effects.

When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.

When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.

languages.text: 当灵能者的盟友或灵能者本人受到{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}影响时，每受到一种影响，被影响的角色就会获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.

traits.locale_text: 当灵能者的盟友或灵能者本人受到{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}影响时，每受到一种影响，被影响的角色就会获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando los aliados del psíquico o él mismo estén bajo los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}, ganan +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} por cada uno de esos efectos.
languages.original_text: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.

traits.locale_text: Cuando los aliados del psíquico o él mismo estén bajo los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}, ganan +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} por cada uno de esos efectos.

languages.text: 異能者の仲間、または異能者自身が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}の効果を得ている場合、各効果に{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}+5を付与する。
languages.original_text: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.

traits.locale_text: 異能者の仲間、または異能者自身が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}の効果を得ている場合、各効果に{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}+5を付与する。

languages.text: Когда на псайкера или его союзников действуют эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}, они получают +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} за каждый такой эффект.
languages.original_text: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.

traits.locale_text: Когда на псайкера или его союзников действуют эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосил{/g}, они получают +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} за каждый такой эффект.
Когда на псайкера или его союзников действуют эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосил{/g}, они получают +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} за каждый такой эффект.

languages.text: Wenn die Verbündeten des Psionikers oder der Psioniker selbst unter dem Effekt der {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} stehen, erhalten sie für jeden solcher Effekte +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die Verbündeten des Psionikers oder der Psioniker selbst unter dem Effekt der {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischen Kräfte{/g} stehen, erhalten sie für jeden solcher Effekte +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque les alliés du psyker ou le psyker lui-même sont sous les effets de {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, ils bénéficient de +5 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} par effet.
languages.original_text: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque les alliés du psyker ou le psyker lui-même sont sous les effets des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, ils bénéficient de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} par effet.

languages.text: Ruhsezerin dost birimleri veya kendisi, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerinin{/g} etkisi altındaysa bu etkilerden her biri için +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliği kazanır.
languages.original_text: When the psyker's allies or the psyker themselves are under the effects of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} for each of such effects.
